Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
2015 has been a challenging year for all of us, but now it's time to lean back and review with pride.

We like to thank you for the successful cooperation and wish you and your families a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year 2016!
Neumuenster, {!Today}
Best regards | Mit freundlichen Grüßen
